headline: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Changes to the S&P/TSX Composite Index
summary: As a result of the quarterly review, S&P Dow Jones Indices will make the following changes in the S&P/TSX Composite Index prior to the open of trading on Monday, June 23, 2025:

headline: Prediction: This "Magnificent Seven" Growth Stock Will Hit an All-Time in June. Here's Why It's Worth Buying Now.
summary: Microsoft has a clear path toward further reliable earnings growth over time.  The company continues to pour money into long-term investments, but is maintaining a robust balance sheet.  Microsoft’s valuation has gotten more expensive, but it is worth the premium price.
